title: Amid Health Concerns, Biden To Make Announcement On Re-Election Bid: Report
content: US President Joe Biden is expected to make a major announcement on his re-election bid, with several senior Democratic leaders suggesting that he leave the race following his disastrous debate performance.
summary: US President Joe Biden is expected to make a major announcement on his re-election bid, with several senior Democratic leaders suggesting that he leave the race following his disastrous debate performance.

title: Video: Trump's Unique Tribute To Firefighter Who Died In Pennsylvania Shooting
content: Donald Trump, in his acceptance speech for the Republican presidential nomination at the Republican convention in Milwaukee today, paid tribute to the man who lost his life during a shooting at his rally in Pennsylvania.
summary: Donald Trump, in his acceptance speech for the Republican presidential nomination at the Republican convention in Milwaukee today, paid tribute to the man who lost his life during a shooting at his rally in Pennsylvania.

title: 7.4- Magnitude Earthquake Hits Northern Chile
content: A major magnitude 7.4 earthquake struck northern Chile on Thursday, the United States Geological Survey said.
summary: A major magnitude 7.4 earthquake struck northern Chile on Thursday, the United States Geological Survey said.

title: "Must Not Criminalise Dissent": Trump Slams "Witch-Hunt" By Democrats
content: Six days after he narrowly survived an assassination attempt, former US President Donald Trump today said the ruling Democrats must stop "weaponising the justice system" and labelling their political opponent an "enemy of democracy".
summary: Six days after he narrowly survived an assassination attempt, former US President Donald Trump today said the ruling Democrats must stop "weaponising the justice system" and labelling their political opponent an "enemy of democracy".

title: Controversial Image Of Trump and Biden On A Magazine Cover Sparks Outrage
content: The magazine's latest Health Issue cover, featuring a Photoshopped image of Donald Trump and Joe Biden in shorts on medical scales, has faced backlash.
summary: The magazine's latest Health Issue cover, featuring a Photoshopped image of Donald Trump and Joe Biden in shorts on medical scales, has faced backlash.

title: "Not Running For Just Half Of America": Donald Trump's Pitch Ahead Of Polls
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump was addressing the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee.
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump was addressing the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee.

title: Joe Biden "Soul Searching" About Dropping Reelection Campaign: Report
content: President Joe Biden was "soul searching" about dropping his Democratic reelection campaign, a source said, while Donald Trump prepared to accept the Republican presidential nomination in what aides said would be an unusually reflective speech.
summary: President Joe Biden was "soul searching" about dropping his Democratic reelection campaign, a source said, while Donald Trump prepared to accept the Republican presidential nomination in what aides said would be an unusually reflective speech.

title: "Had God On My Side": Donald Trump Recounts Being Shot At During Rally
content: Former US President Donald Trump recounted the assassination attempt on him during a campaign rally on Saturday while addressing the Republican National Convention (RNC).
summary: Former US President Donald Trump recounted the assassination attempt on him during a campaign rally on Saturday while addressing the Republican National Convention (RNC).

title: Journalist Fined Rs 4.5 Lakh For Posting A Joke On Giorgia Meloni's Height
content: A Milan court has ordered a journalist to pay Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni damages of 5000 euros for making fun of her in a social media post, news agency ANSA and other local media reported.
summary: A Milan court has ordered a journalist to pay Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni damages of 5000 euros for making fun of her in a social media post, news agency ANSA and other local media reported.

title: Biden Nears Crunch Point As Pressure Grows To Drop Out Of White House Race
content: US President Joe Biden was reportedly coming closer to dropping out of the White House race Friday as allies including Barack Obama were said to have expressed concerns that he can no longer win the 2024 election.
summary: US President Joe Biden was reportedly coming closer to dropping out of the White House race Friday as allies including Barack Obama were said to have expressed concerns that he can no longer win the 2024 election.

title: Tulsi Gabbard Slams Kamala Harris Over Her Remarks Against JD Vance
content: Former US Congresswoman Tulsi Gabbard has slammed the US Vice President over her remarks against former US President Donald Trump's running mate, JD Vance, calling Kamala Harris a "self-serving politician who should not be in office."
summary: Former US Congresswoman Tulsi Gabbard has slammed the US Vice President over her remarks against former US President Donald Trump's running mate, JD Vance, calling Kamala Harris a "self-serving politician who should not be in office."

title: Working With Trump "Would Be Hard" If He Wins, Says Zelensky
content: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy acknowledged in an interview published on Thursday that a victory for Donald Trump in the U.S. election in November would be difficult for his country but Ukrainians were prepared.
summary: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy acknowledged in an interview published on Thursday that a victory for Donald Trump in the U.S. election in November would be difficult for his country but Ukrainians were prepared.

title: Netanyahu Vows To Keep Control Of Rafah Crossing Even After Ceasefire Deal
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has made a surprise visit to Gaza's Rafah, pledging to uphold Israeli control over the Rafah crossing and the entire Gaza-Egypt border.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has made a surprise visit to Gaza's Rafah, pledging to uphold Israeli control over the Rafah crossing and the entire Gaza-Egypt border.

title: No Change To Trump Campaign If Biden Drops Out, Tells Advisor
content: A senior advisor to Donald Trump said Thursday that the Republican's White House campaign will not fundamentally change should US President Joe Biden bow to Democratic pressure and end his reelection bid.
summary: A senior advisor to Donald Trump said Thursday that the Republican's White House campaign will not fundamentally change should US President Joe Biden bow to Democratic pressure and end his reelection bid.

title: Kim Jong Un Hosts Russia Military Delegation After Putin Visit

title: Biden, Netanyahu Expected To Meet Next Week: White House
content: US President Joe Biden is still expected to meet with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu when he visits Washington next week but it will depend on his recovery from Covid, the White House said Thursday.
summary: US President Joe Biden is still expected to meet with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu when he visits Washington next week but it will depend on his recovery from Covid, the White House said Thursday.

title: American Comedy Legend Bob Newhart Dies At 94: Publicist
content: Bob Newhart, the American stand-up performer whose comedy made him one of the top TV stars of his era, has died, his publicist announced Thursday. He was 94 years old.
summary: Bob Newhart, the American stand-up performer whose comedy made him one of the top TV stars of his era, has died, his publicist announced Thursday. He was 94 years old.

title: Israeli Strike Kills Field Commander In Elite Hezbollah Unit: Report
content: A field commander in Hezbollah's elite Radwan forces was killed in an Israeli strike on south Lebanon, two security sources said on Thursday, the latest senior member of the group to be killed in months of tit-for-tat fighting with Israel.
summary: A field commander in Hezbollah's elite Radwan forces was killed in an Israeli strike on south Lebanon, two security sources said on Thursday, the latest senior member of the group to be killed in months of tit-for-tat fighting with Israel.

title: Cop Injured In Attack In Central Paris, Says French Minister
content: One police officer was injured in an attack in central Paris on Thursday, French Interior Minister Gerald Darmanin said.
summary: One police officer was injured in an attack in central Paris on Thursday, French Interior Minister Gerald Darmanin said.

title: Trump 'Owns Republicans' Now, Critics Wary Of Unchecked Quest For Power
content: Five days after narrowly escaping assassination, Donald Trump will accept his presidential nomination on Thursday before an adoring crowd of supporters, the final act in his transformation of the Republican Party into the party of Trump.
summary: Five days after narrowly escaping assassination, Donald Trump will accept his presidential nomination on Thursday before an adoring crowd of supporters, the final act in his transformation of the Republican Party into the party of Trump.
